text.tspan: Casting Checks recieve a bonus to your Roll determined by your
Talent Proficiency Tier with that Talent. Additionally, each instance of
Casting Exhaustion Inflicts a -1 penalty to Casting Checks. At the
end of a Full Rest remove all Casting Exhaustion you have.
Major Failure
Minor Failure
Minor Success
Major Success
Moderate Success
Invocation Fails. Suffer 1 Casting Exhaustion, Complications
Success. Effects are Weakened and Suffer 1 Casting Exhaustion
Suffer 1 Casting Exhaustion or Effects are Weakened
You may choose Strengthened, if you do, Suffer 1 Casting Exhaustion
Effects are Strengthened
Roll
Result
Outcomes
Invocations
Channel Invocation (1R) [NA] {1 Casting Attribute} Select an
Invocation, perform your Casting Aspect, and make a Casting
Check. Alternatively, you may forgo performing your Casting Aspect
but suffer 1 Casting Exhaustion. Gain the Channeling Condition.
Channeling The Character can not Cast another Invocation.
Additionally, any time that Character Suffers Damage they must
make a Simplified Casting Check. On any Failure the Effects of the
Invocation end and the Channeling Condition is removed from the
Character. Additionally, as a Reaction the Character can choose to
end the Invocation and remove the Channeling Condition.
Charm (1R) [NA] {1 Casting Attribute} Specify a minor effect,
perform your Casting Aspect, and make a Simplified Casting Check.
On any result, the effect happens. On any Failure, you gain 1
Casting Exhaustion.
Casting Checks recieve a bonus to your Roll determined by your
Talent Proficiency Tier with that Talent. Additionally, each instance of
Casting Exhaustion Inflicts a -1 penalty to Casting Checks. At the
end of a Full Rest remove all Casting Exhaustion you have.
Major Failure
Minor Failure
Minor Success
Major Success
Moderate Success
Invocation Fails. Suffer 1 Casting Exhaustion, Complications
Success. Effects are Weakened and Suffer 1 Casting Exhaustion
Suffer 1 Casting Exhaustion or Effects are Weakened
You may choose Strengthened, if you do, Suffer 1 Casting Exhaustion
Effects are Strengthened
Roll
Result
Outcomes
Invocations
Channel Invocation (1R) [NA] {1 Casting Attribute} Select an
Invocation, perform your Casting Aspect, and make a Casting
Check. Alternatively, you may forgo performing your Casting Aspect
but suffer 1 Casting Exhaustion. Gain the Channeling Condition.
Channeling The Character can not Cast another Invocation.
Additionally, any time that Character Suffers Damage they must
make a Simplified Casting Check. On any Failure the Effects of the
Invocation end and the Channeling Condition is removed from the
Character. Additionally, as a Reaction the Character can choose to
end the Invocation and remove the Channeling Condition.
Charm (1R) [NA] {1 Casting Attribute} Specify a minor effect,
perform your Casting Aspect, and make a Simplified Casting Check.
On any result, the effect happens. On any Failure, you gain 1
Casting Exhaustion.
